text: The 2018 Mid-Eastern Athletic Conference Women's Basketball Tournament took place March 5–10, 2018 at the Norfolk Scope in Norfolk, Virginia. First round games were played March 5 and March 6, with the quarterfinal games played on March 7 and 8. The semifinals were held March 9, with the championship game on March 10.http://meacsports.com/documents/2018/3/1//2018_WBB_BBT_Bracket.pdf == Seeds == All 13 teams were eligible for the tournament. Teams were seeded by record within the conference, with a tiebreaker system to seed teams with identical conference records. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Seed !School !Conference |- |1 |align=left| North Carolina A&T; | 15–1 |- |2 |align=left| Bethune–Cookman | 15–1 |- |3 |align=left| Hampton | 12–4 |- |4 |align=left| Norfolk State | 11–5 |- |5 |align=left| Howard | 8–8 |- |6 |align=left| Morgan State | 8–8 |- |7 |align=left| Maryland Eastern Shore | 7–9 |- |8 |align=left| North Carolina Central | 7–9 |- |9 |align=left| South Carolina State | 6–10 |- |10 |align=left| Delaware State | 5–11 |- |11 |align=left| Coppin State | 5–11 |- |12 |align=left| Florida A&M; | 4–12 |- |13 |align=left| Savannah State | 1–15 |- | colspan="5" align="left" |† – MEAC regular season champions.
